# Reacquiring or Reinstating a Driver’s Licence or Licence Class

Here is the procedure to reacquire or reinstate a licence that was revoked or suspended for a medical reason, impaired driving, dependence on alcohol, drugs or medication, an accumulation of demerit points, or any other reason.

## Important!

For which reason do you no longer hold a licence?\- Choose an option -Support PaymentsImpaired drivingIllegal remunerated passenger transportation by automobileMedical reasonSubstance use disorder (alcohol, drugs or medication)Accumulation of demerit pointsUnpaid finesCancellationA stay outside QuébecCriminal Code offence

Continue
![](https://saaq.gouv.qc.ca/_assets/3137b1a864c689786cac76b3def62dd1/Assets/img/ajax-loader.gif)

Last update: June  9, 2023

## Safety first, on the road and online

We are committed to protecting your personal information and privacy. That’s why, when we collect data, we follow a [Policy on Privacy](https://saaq.gouv.qc.ca/en/policies/privacy) that is responsible and transparent. By continuing to browse without modifying your preferences, you accept the use of cookies.
